H0.text: What is the main ingredient of the Mexican breakfast dish huervos rancheros. Tortilla

H1.text: What is the main ingredient of the Mexican breakfast dish huervos rancheros. Salsa

H2.text: What is the main ingredient of the Mexican breakfast dish huervos rancheros. Cheese

H3.text: What is the main ingredient of the Mexican breakfast dish huervos rancheros. Egg

A4.text: The eggs were simply cooked in a mixture of red or green chile sauce and lard.

A5.text: The basic dish consists of fried eggs served on lightly fried or charred corn or flour tortillas topped with a spicy salsa made of tomatoes, chili peppers, and onion.

A6.text: Tortillas are a cornerstone of Mesoamerican cuisine.

A7.text: Corn tortillas in Mesoamerica are known from as early as 500 BCE.
